subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin passed Jeff Burton, his fellow Virginia native, on the 427th lap and held on to win the Goody’s Cool Orange 500 for his fourth career Nascar Sprint Cup victory.
snippet: Denny Hamlin passed Jeff Burton, his fellow Virginia native, on the 427th lap and held on to win the Goody’s Cool Orange 500 for his fourth career Nascar Sprint Cup victory.
